text: Hi Guys, I have created a template using HubSpot. Template looks good in mobile and Desktop. But when I test same template only in Gmail App then Footer does not show as full width it show only 50%. I have checked media query all is correct. If I view that same template in mobile in browser it looks perfect, this problem occurs only when I view in Gmail app.   Could anyone please help me to find the solution? Thanks!

Hi <@U01KBGFSWD7>, the email client don't have a real html render app as a web browser like Chrome. So the media query don't work sometimes.

The only way to help you is to use html inline parameter
```<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">```
